Interface DoomThingFlags

All Known Subinterfaces:
BoomThingFlags, MBFThingFlags
public interface DoomThingFlags
Thing flag constants for Doom/Heretic. The constant value is how many places to bit shift 1 to equal the flag bit.
Author:
Matthew Tropiano

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final int
    AMBUSH
    Thing flag: Ambushes players.
    static final int
    EASY
    Thing flag: Appears on easy difficulty.
    static final int
    HARD
    Thing flag: Appears on hard difficulty.
    static final int
    MEDIUM
    Thing flag: Appears on medium difficulty.
    static final int
    NOT_SINGLEPLAYER
    Thing flag: Does not appear in single player.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default int
    value(int flag)
    Gets the bit value of the flag (shifted).
